thread.title: Kaley Cuoco Thanks Fans as She Prepares for 'Next Chapter in My Life'
thread.title_full: Kaley Cuoco Thanks Fans as She Prepares for 'Next Chapter in My Life'

title: Kaley Cuoco Thanks Fans as She Prepares for 'Next Chapter in My Life'
text:
Kaley Cuoco Thanks Fans as She Prepares for 'Next Chapter in My Life' Posted today at 1:30pm 
ABC/Randy Holmes (LOS ANGELES) -- A month after announcing that she and husband Ryan Sweeting were divorcing, Kaley Cuoco took to Instagram earlier this week to thank fans for their support and discuss what's next. 
"I'm feeling completely overwhelmed with the outpouring of kindness and support from the people that surround me and from those I have never even met," the TV star said. 
She continued, "I want you to know, I read all your comments and your sweet words have touched me deeply. I'm incredibly grateful for all your love as I start this next chapter in my life." 

A photo posted by @normancook on Oct 20, 2015 at 8:48pm PDT 
In September, Cuoco announced that she was ending her marriage after exchanging vows on New Year's Eve in 2013. 
Last week, Cuoco also responded to rumors of a secret relationship she allegedly had with her Big Bang Theory co-star Johnny Galecki. "So sorry to disappoint, but no home wreckers or secret flings going on here," wrote Cuoco on Instagram . "Me and @sanctionedjohnnygalecki are just the best of buds - Leonard and Penny will just have to suffice!!!" Copyright Â© 2015, ABC Radio. All rights reserved.
